definition: content/calm/still/quiet/safe/secure/in good health/to find a place for/to install/to fix/to fit/to bring (a charge against sb)/to pacify/to harbor (good intentions)/security/safety/peace/ampere
seeking only ease and comfort (idiom); making no attempt to improve oneself/taking things easily without attending to responsibilities

sentences.english: Everyone in the company is supposed to work hard, not to lie on a bed of roses.
sentences.chinese: 公司里的每个人都应努力工作，不得苟且偷安。

sentences.english: I prefer the challenge of life to the guaranteed existence;
sentences.chinese: 我宁愿接受生活的挑战而不愿苟且偷安。

definition: seeking only ease and comfort (idiom); making no attempt to improve oneself/taking things easily without attending to responsibilities
see 苟且偷安[gou3 qie3 tou1 an1]
not to worry/not to show concern
to skive off work/to be lazy
in danger of collapse/in a parlous state/(of person) treacherous
to continue the same old routine/to carry on just as before/to procrastinate
to abide by the law/to respect the law
lit. a caged bird in a pavilion (idiom); fig. to lose vigilance by comfortable living/unaware of the disasters ahead/a fool's paradise
